fi.javalabra.logic

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • fi.javalabra.logic.Field

  • public class Field
extends Object
    Field class which is responsible for wrapping up data associated with game logic and essential game actions like collisions, moving the ball, and moving the paddle
    Author:
    jola

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Field(int height, int width, Ball ball) 
      Field(int height, int width, Ball ball, Paddle paddle, Blocks blocks)
      Construct the playing field by specifying the height and width of the field

      • movePaddle

        public void movePaddle(int dx)
        Move the paddle along the x-axis by the amount specified. Can't move the paddle out of bounds.
        Parameters:
        dx - negative value to move left, positive value to move right

      • placePaddle

        public void placePaddle(int x)
        Move the paddle to specified x-coordinate. Can't move the paddle out of bounds
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate to move the paddle to
